properties.name: youtube.application.auth_uri
properties.description: The URL endpoint used for initiating the OAuth 2.0 authentication process, where the user is redirected to grant access to the YouTube application.

properties.name: youtube.application.token_uri
properties.description: The URL endpoint used to exchange the authorization code for an access token, enabling authenticated access to YouTube APIs.

properties.name: youtube.application.project_id
properties.description: The unique identifier of the Google Cloud project associated with the YouTube application, used to link the application to its configurations in the Google Cloud Console.

properties.name: youtube.application.clientid
properties.description: The unique client identifier assigned to the YouTube application during the OAuth 2.0 registration process, used to authenticate the application with Google services.

properties.name: youtube.application.secret
properties.description: The client secret generated alongside the client ID, used to securely authenticate the YouTube application during token exchanges in the OAuth 2.0 flow.

properties.name: youtube.application.auth_provider_x509_cert_url
properties.description: The URL that provides the X.509 public key certificates for verifying the authenticity of the tokens issued by Google's OAuth 2.0 authorization server.
